test-set.name: error-code
test-set.description: Tests error conditions. This test set should include a test for every error code (however, coverage of new XSLT 3.0 errors is incomplete).

source.content: <t04> <a id="a" code="1" value="10"/> <a id="b" code="2" value="20"/> <a id="c" code="2" value="30"/> <a id="d" code="1" value="40"/> </t04>

test-case.name: error-code-004
test-case.description: Error: XPath syntax unmatched square brackets

test-case.name: error-code-007
test-case.description: Test declaring a variable with incorrect type "element/attribute of type X".

test-case.name: error-code-008
test-case.description: Error: XPath syntax processing instruction must be a QName

test-case.name: error-code-011
test-case.description: Test declaring a variable with incorrect type "element/attribute of type X".

test-case.name: error-code-014
test-case.description: Error: XPath syntax needs a space

test-case.name: error-code-019
test-case.description: TEST xsl:namespace declaring the default namespace (XSLT 2.0) this is an error if the element is in no namespace

test-case.name: error-code-025
test-case.description: error: context item is not set on entry to a stylesheet function

test-case.name: error-code-028
test-case.description: Error: XPath syntax not a valid XML Name character

test-case.name: error-code-032
test-case.description: Error: Calling xsl:apply-imports when the current template rule is null

test-case.name: error-code-033
test-case.description: Error: Calling xsl:apply-imports when evaluating a global variable

test-case.name: error-code-042
test-case.description: Error: xsl:apply-imports - xsl:sort not allowed here

test-case.name: error-code-043
test-case.description: Error: xsl:apply-imports - xsl:fallback not allowed here

test-case.name: error-code-044
test-case.description: Error: xsl:apply-templates (select att must be a node()*)

test-case.name: error-code-045
test-case.description: Error: xsl:apply-templates using undeclared prefix in mode name

test-case.name: error-code-052
test-case.description: Error: xsl:call-template using an undeclared namespace

test-case.name: error-code-066
test-case.description: Error: xsl:element bad element name (this was a recoverable error)

test-case.name: error-code-068
test-case.description: Error: xsl:element - bad prefix in QName

test-case.name: error-code-070
test-case.description: Error: key name is not a valid QName

test-case.name: error-code-071
test-case.description: Error: key name uses undeclared prefix

test-case.name: error-code-090
test-case.description: Error: xsl:include - file does not exist

test-case.name: error-code-097
test-case.description: Error: xsl:include - target is not a stylesheet

test-case.name: error-code-099
test-case.description: Error: xsl:import - file does not exist

test-case.name: error-code-106
test-case.description: Error: xsl:import - not first top-level element

test-case.name: error-code-107
test-case.description: Error: xsl:import - target is not a stylesheet

test-case.name: error-code-108
test-case.description: Error: xsl:template - no match or name

test-case.name: error-code-120
test-case.description: Error: xsl:call-template - bad template name prefix

test-case.name: error-code-124
test-case.description: Error: xsl:call-template - must be in a template body

test-case.name: error-code-137
test-case.description: Error: xsl:for-each - xsl:sort must come first

test-case.name: error-code-141
test-case.description: Error: xsl:variable - select attribute plus content

test-case.name: error-code-149
test-case.description: Test that PI names may NOT contain a colon (see Namespaces REC section 6)

test-case.name: error-code-152
test-case.description: Test validation when version matches supported version. This stylesheet should flag an error.

test-case.name: error-code-153
test-case.description: Test validation when version is lower than supported version. This stylesheet should flag an error.

test-case.name: error-code-154
test-case.description: BUG: 5.4.1/008 DESCRIPTION: No error is reported if xsl:text or xsl:value-of is used at the top level of the stylesheet.

test-case.name: error-code-155
test-case.description: Test "treat as" failure on simple values. the next two are known at compile time here are some that aren't known until run-time

test-case.name: error-code-156
test-case.description: Test "treat as" failure on simple values. here are some that aren't known until run-time

test-case.name: error-code-157
test-case.description: Test "treat as" cardinality failure on simple values.

test-case.name: error-code-158
test-case.description: Test "treat as" on sequences. treat-as failure: 13th item in list is a string, not a decimal

test-case.name: error-code-160
test-case.description: tests syntax error in a regular expression.

test-case.name: error-code-161
test-case.description: Test no xsl:fallback for an unknown extension element.

test-case.name: error-code-163
test-case.description: XPath 2.0: test min/max on a heterogeneous sequence

test-case.name: error-code-164
test-case.description: Test error() function with no arguments

test-case.name: error-code-165
test-case.description: Test error() function with a string arguments

test-case.name: error-code-166
test-case.description: test for disabling output escaping in nested xsl:text now an error, XSLT 2.0 no longer allows nested xsl:text

test-case.name: error-code-167
test-case.description: Test how sum() handles a mixed sequence

test-case.name: error-code-168
test-case.description: Type error in argument to a function call

test-case.name: error-code-169
test-case.description: Type error in argument to arithmetic operator

test-case.name: error-code-171
test-case.description: DOCUMENT: http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath SECTION: 3.4 Booleans Test of "=" operator with mixed types String to number comparison is not allowed except in backwards compatibility mode

test-case.name: error-code-175
test-case.description: unknown top-level element in XSLT namespace

test-case.name: error-code-176
test-case.description: variable declared as child of xsl:apply-imports

test-case.name: error-code-178
test-case.description: "." used when undefined - type error detected statically or dynamically

test-case.name: error-code-179
test-case.description: "." used when undefined - type error detected statically or dynamically

test-case.name: error-code-180
test-case.description: axis step used when context item is not a node - type error detected statically or dynamically

test-case.name: error-code-181
test-case.description: "." used when not a node - static error even though never executed

test-case.name: error-code-182
test-case.description: "." used when not a node - optionally a static error even though never executed

test-case.name: error-code-183
test-case.description: "." used when not a node - static error even though never executed

test-case.name: error-code-185a
test-case.description: test reporting of dynamic errors in a simplified stylesheet

test-case.name: error-code-185b
test-case.description: test reporting of dynamic errors in a simplified stylesheet

test-case.name: error-code-186
test-case.description: Test xsl:result-document writing twice to same destination

test-case.name: error-code-187
test-case.description: this succeeds in 1.0, with top-down construction, but is should fail in 2.0 with bottom up construction. Note that the xsl:copy is copying a document node which can't have an attribute.

test-case.name: error-code-188
test-case.description: tunnel='yes' not allowed on a stylesheet parameter

test-case.name: error-code-189
test-case.description: tunnel='yes' not allowed on a function parameter

test-case.name: error-code-191
test-case.description: Error: xsl:template - undefined key in pattern

test-case.name: error-code-192
test-case.description: two range variables, both have the same name this is actually allowed; but $i/@val gives an error because the context item isn't a node

test-case.name: error-code-193
test-case.description: Range variable used outside its scope

test-case.name: error-code-194
test-case.description: Test use of a variable within a pattern causing a circularity (XSLT 2.0)

test-case.name: error-code-195
test-case.description: Test use of variables in a key match pattern (XSLT 2.0) causing a circularity

test-case.name: error-code-196
test-case.description: Test use of variables in a key use expression (XSLT 2.0) causing a circularity

test-case.name: error-code-197
test-case.description: Test use of key() in a key use expression (XSLT 2.0) with circular definitions

test-case.name: error-code-198
test-case.description: type-check contents of a template rule against the type of the context item (could be detected statically by inference from the match pattern, but dynamic reporting is also allowed)

test-case.name: error-code-215
test-case.description: Generate error XTSE0165. Note this involves reading a document that is not a valid stylesheet module, so there will always be an alternative of reporting the error in that module, in this case XTSE0150.

test-case.name: error-code-229c
test-case.description: Generate error XTSE0270: two statically-conflicting strip-space/preserve-space declarations

test-case.name: error-code-239
test-case.description: Originally designed to generate error XTDE0485, but this was removed by erratum E16

test-case.name: error-code-340
test-case.description: Generate error XTSE1220 (different collations for two keys). May also generate XTSE1210 (unknown collation)

test-case.name: error-code-377
test-case.description: Generate error XTSE0010 (Note: was XTDE1450 in an earlier draft specification)

test-case.name: error-code-410
test-case.description: Generate error XTDE0610 for a global parameter

test-case.name: error-code-411
test-case.description: Attempt to write twice to implicit final result tree
